title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 337.3 - Effective date of disability retirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 337.3 - Effective date of disability retirement

State Regulations

The effective date of retirement for disability purposes
shall be the later of either: (a) the
date of the filing of the application for disability retirement; or
(b) the date following the last date of
active service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
337.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
